quiz.question: Which supernatural drama series starring Sarah Michelle Gellar premiered in 1997?
Which band famously performed 'Smells Like Teen Spirit' at the 1992 MTV VMAs?
Which experimental 1999 TV series blended sci-fi and anime aesthetics for adult audiences?
Which singer performed 'My Heart Will Go On' from the 1997 blockbuster soundtrack?
Which sitcom episode in 1997 featured Ross and Rachel's first kiss at Central Perk?
options: The One Where Ross Finds Out
The One With the Prom Video
quiz.answer: The One Where Ross Finds Out

quiz.question: Which 1994 Pixar short was originally produced in 1997 and later paired with theatrical releases?
Which Nintendo home console launched in 1996 using cartridges for games?
Which comic-based 1998 film launched a successful superhero franchise starring Tobey Maguire?
Which niche 1990s handheld used a dot-matrix watch-style interface for gaming 'Digimon' pets?
Which popular 1993 film featured groundbreaking CGI for a theme park disaster?
Which technology became widely available for home use after dial-up modems in the 1990s?
Which 1999 handheld console prototype from Nintendo led to later portable innovations?
Which animated series debuted in 1999 featuring an optimistic sea sponge character?
Which 1998 film featured a fictional boy wizard introduced to the world?
options: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
quiz.answer: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

quiz.question: Which fashion label's slip dresses became a 1990s staple after celebrity red-carpet appearances?
